step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, ready for the next movement.
You're raising your hands, but try to keep your elbows closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and not pulling forward.
Good hold! Remember to maintain that upright posture and keep your elbows wide.
You're returning to the start. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter during the reverse motion.
Second rep starting well. Ensure hands are clasped comfortably in your lap.
As you raise your hands, focus on bringing your elbows closer to your head for better shoulder stretch.
Good job spreading your elbows wide. Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady. Maintain the wide elbow position and upright head throughout the hold.
Returning to the start. Try to keep your wrists straighter as you bring your hands back down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and wrists straighter on the return.
